website_summaries.verdict: The Asus Zenbook Pro UX501VW-DS71T is an excellent desktop-replacement laptop with a fast SSD and strong performance, and it costs less than much of the competition.

customer_reviews.title: This machine does not support 24GB RAM and was flashed with the wrong BIOS
customer_reviews.text: The maximum RAM this model can support is 16GB, HIDevolution have put 24GB in, but that means 16 have become incompatible and my machine is running on 8GB. The BIOS flashed on my machine is N501VW, not UX501VW - it is amazing that it even switches on! HIDevolution did spend some time on the phone with me to confirm the issue, but as soon as they did, they refused to help me further unless I paid them. End of the day, I have a machine at least 1/3 of the power I paid for. Bad experience. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kagg

customer_reviews.title: solid packaging and great looking machine
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today, solid packaging and great looking machine, seems like great build quality. Spec was as advertised, and it works well. I immediately reformatted and installed Linux Mint, and after a few tweaks, works brilliantly, so no problems there. Yes, it is a US keyboard, but I'm used to the Mac keyboards which are all US layout too, so not a problem, and it is pasted all over the product description as well as the answered questions, so don't understand why some users are "shocked" they received a US layout keyboard. Will update if anything goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley T

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fabulous! lol
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this product. I got the 24GB RAM, 512 SSD and Windows 10 Pro one. They did the upgrade very professionally. The device is: Silent, Elegant Design Excellent performance Long Battery life, The only bad thing is that it gets dirty too quickly. But easy to wipe too.
customer_reviews.author: ugurtanriverdi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful computer with features that will make you have a laptop for a lot of time
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Good move!
customer_reviews.text: I sold my Macbook Pro 15" mid 2015 to get this laptop. Good move!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Incredible

customer_reviews.title: Second one of these Ive bought due to theft - ...
customer_reviews.text: Second one of these Ive bought due to theft - didn't hesitate to purchase again rather than look at alternatives
customer_reviews.author: Mr O.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything is fine except for the battery that easily drained.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is a grate lap top I give it 5 star rating

customer_reviews.title: DECEPTION AT BEST
customer_reviews.text: NOT A UK COMPANY AS ADVERTISED. GREAT PRODUCT, DECEPTIVE SALES PITCH! IF I WANTED A US KEYBOARD I WOULD MOVE THE USA.
customer_reviews.author: aka_dino

customer_reviews.title: Vat problem
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product but cant provide a vat reveipt. I have lost £300 as a result
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amaizing laptop and to my surprise came with very quality laptop bag.
customer_reviews.author: Pseudonym

customer_reviews.title: Amazing computer
customer_reviews.text: My best PC ever. The resolution is amazing, the look is classic but very pretty. My first computer was a Timex 2048 Sinclair, 48k ROM 28 years ago.... 256×192 pixels, 15 colors. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Silva

customer_reviews.title: bad quality screen, pale yellow not 4k,system reboots on its own, US MODEL NOT FOR UK CUSTOMERS
customer_reviews.text: AFTER SPENDING MORE THAN £1600 POUNDS WHAT YOU GET IS A JOKE, THE PRODUCT IS A US MODEL NOT WITH EU KEYBOARD, ORDERED WITH WINDOWS 10 PRO ARRIVED without windows 10 pro, the sound quality is awful, the screen which is supposed to be 4K IS DISASTER,
customer_reviews.author: J. Nawaz

customer_reviews.title: US Import
customer_reviews.text: As noted in questions and answers the DS71T is the US model with US layout. I believe the UK model is the FJ098T which I will verify when Asus opens next. That model is marketed under the Amazon title "Asus 15.6-Inch Quad Full HD LED Notebook".
customer_reviews.author: A. Mather
